result.title: Week #9 + #10
result.content:
Hello everyone,

In the last two sessions, we solved some dynamic programming problems and talked about Topological Sort.

Here are the codes we wrote during session #9:

  • Building of the Next Array: https://ideone.com/8FVNrF

  • Solution of problem SPOJ MAX_NUM: https://ideone.com/n5OrvP, the link to the problem: http://www.spoj.com/problems/MAX_NUM/

  • Slow Topological Sort O(V^2): https://ideone.com/sUMCRl

  • Fast Topological Sort O(V+E): https://ideone.com/KQ3V5s

The codes of session #10:

Solution of Four Segments: https://ideone.com/zrXOAX

Solution of Message: https://ideone.com/7Imhdm, another solution (no DP): https://ideone.com/xCSV9g

Solution of A Twisty Movement: https://ideone.com/hCiRtG

More problems on Topological Sort:

http://www.spoj.com/problems/PFDEP/

https://uva.onlinejudge.org/index.php?option=onlinejudge&page=show_problem&problem=813

http://www.spoj.com/problems/MAKETREE/

Additional Problem:

https://icpcarchive.ecs.baylor.edu/index.php?option=onlinejudge&page=show_problem&problem=2765

Good luck!
